title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Skills: Data-Driven Customized Learning Problem Diagnosis and Improvement Process

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language instruction experience and proficiency in digital assessment tools
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Formative assessment data can diagnose individual learners' vulnerable conceptual areas with 80% accuracy
Based on analysis results, personalized supplementary learning materials (quizzes/videos/reading resources) can be provided within 72 hours
Using a learning problem diagnostic tool, instructional strategies can be improved three or more times and effectiveness verification reports can be generated
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
